key_points: CNN reportedly ignored sexual misconduct allegations against Gov. Andrew Cuomo.
CNN also did not cover the COVID-19 testing scandal involving Chris Cuomo and his family.
Claims against Andrew Cuomo by Sherry Vill, his ninth accuser, were not reported by CNN.
CNN is accused of having an 'blackout' on reporting negative news against the Cuomos.
Allegations of groping against Gov. Cuomo are also being ignored, labeled as 'unverified' by CNN.
For almost a week, CNN did not report on the VIP COVID-19 testing given to Chris Cuomo and his family.
Chris Cuomo did not address the scandal when he returned to his primetime show.
CNN's defense of Chris Cuomo and the testing scandal has attracted criticism.
CNN spokesperson's defense of Chris Cuomo's actions during the pandemic sparked outrage.
Fox News criticized CNN's lack of coverage on these scandals.
